text: Mary Agnes Stump Taylor (1885-) was an American bryologist noted for collecting and identifying many species of bryophytes across North America. Her collection of around 8,000 plants was so extensive that it has been used to identify the range of plants several decades after their original collection. == Works == * * == References == Category:1885 births Category:American women scientists Category:American botanists Category:bryologists Category:Year of death missing
title: Mary S. Taylor
